maqras.text: 20|2|hamane nahin avatarit kiya hai aapapar quraan is lie ki aap duhkhee hon[1].
20|3|parantu ye usakee shiksha ke lie hai, jo darata[1] ho.
20|4|utaara jaana us or se hai, jisane utpatti kee hai dharatee tatha uchch aakaashon kee.
20|5|jo atyant krpaasheel, arsh par sthir hai.
20|6|usee ka[1] hai, jo aakaashon, jo dharatee mein, jo donon ke beech tatha jo bhoomi ke neeche hai.
20|7|yadi tum uchch svar mein baat karo, to vaastav mein, vah jaanata hai bhed ko tatha atyadhik chhupe bhed ko.
20|8|vahee allaah hai, nahin hai koee vandaneey (poojy) parantu vahee. usee ke uttam naam hain.
20|9|aur (he nabee!) kya aapako moosa kee baat pahunchee

20|10|jab usane dekhee ek agni, phir kaha apane parivaar seh ruko, mainne ek agni dekhee hai, sambhav hai ki main tumhaare paas usaka koee angaar laoon athava pa jaoon aag par maarg kee koee soochana[1].
20|11|phir jab vahaan pahuncha, to pukaara gayaah he moosa
20|12|vaastav mein, main hee tera paalanahaar hoon, too utaar de apane donon joote, kyonki too pavitr vaadee (upatyaka) "tuva" mein hai.
20|13|aur mainne tujhe chun[1] liya hai. atah dhyaan se sun, jo vahyee kee ja rahee hai.
20|14|nihsandeh main hee allaah hoon, mere siva koee poojy nahin, to meree hee ibaadat (vandana) kar tatha mere smaran (yaad) ke lie namaaz kee sthaapana[1] kar.
20|15|nishchay pralay aane vaalee hai, main use gupt rakhana chaahata hoon, taaki pratikaar (badala) diya jaaye, pratyek praanee ko usake prayaas ke anusaar.
20|16|atah, tumhen na rok de, us ( ke vishvaas) se, jo usapar eemaan (vishvaas) nahin rakhata aur anusaran kiya apanee ichchha ka, anyatha tera naash ho jaayega.
20|17|aur he moosa! ye tere daahine haath mein kya hai
20|18|uttar diyaah ye meree laathee hai; main isapar sahaara leta hoon, isase apanee bakariyon ke lie patte jhaadata hoon tatha meree isamen doosaree aavashyaktaayen (bhee) hain.
20|19|kahaah ise phenkie, he moosa
20|20|to usane use phenk diya aur sahasa vah ek sarp thee, jo dod raha tha.
20|21|kahaah pakad le ise, aur dar nahin, ham ise pher denge, isakee pratham sthiti kee or.
20|22|aur apana haath laga de apanee kaankh (bagal) kee or, vah nikalega chamakata hua bina kisee rog ke, ye doosara chamatkaar hai.
20|23|taaki ham tujhe dikhaayen, apanee badee nishaaniyaan.
20|24|tum firaun ke paas jao, vah vidrohee ho gaya hai.
20|25|moosa ne praarthana keeh he mere paalanahaar! khol de, mere lie mera seena.
20|26|tatha saral kar de, mere lie mera kaam.
20|27|aur khol de, meree zubaan kee gaanth.
20|28|taaki log meree baat samajhen.
20|29|tatha bana de, mera ek sahaayak mere parivaar mein se.
20|30|mere bheeee haaroon ko.
20|31|usake dvaara drdh kar de meree shakti ko.
20|32|aur saajhee bana de, use mere kaam mein.
20|33|taaki ham donon teree pavitrata ka gaan adhik karen.
20|34|tatha tujhe adhik smaran (yaad) karen.
20|35|nihsandeh, too hamen bhalee prakaar dekhane-bhaalane vaala hai.
20|36|allaah ne kahaah he moosa! teree sab maang pooree kar dee gayee.
20|37|aur ham upakaar kar chuke hain tumapar ek baar aur[1] (bhee).
20|38|jab hamane utaar diya, teree maan ke dil mein, jisakee vahyee (prakaashna) kee ja rahee hai.

20|39|ki ise rakh de taaboot (sandooq) mein, phir use nadee mein daal de, phir nadee use kinaare laga degee, jise utha lega mera shatru tatha usaka shatru[1] aur mainne daal diya tujhapar apanee or se vishesh[2] prem, taaki tera paalan-poshan meree raksha mein ho.

20|40|jab chal rahee thee teree bahan[1], phir kah rahee theeh kya main tumhen use bata doon, jo isaka laalan-paalan kare? phir hamane punah tumhen pahuncha diya tumhaaree maan ke paas, taaki usakee aankh thandee ho aur udaaseen na ho tatha he moosa! toone maar diya ek vyakti ko, to hamane tujhe mukt kar diya chinta[2] se aur hamane teree bhalee-bhaanti pareeksha lee. phir too rah gaya varshon madyan ke logon mein, phir too (madyan se) apane nishchit samay par aa gaya.
20|41|aur mainne bana liya hai tujhe vishsh apane lie.
20|42|ja too aur tera bhaee, meree nishaaniyaan lekar aur donon aalasy na karana mere smaran (yaad) mein.
20|43|tum donon firaun ke paas jao, vaastav mein, vah ullanghan kar gaya hai.
20|44|phir usase komal bol bolo, kadaachit vah shiksha grahan kare athava dare.
20|45|donon ne kahaah he hamaare paalanahaar! hamen bhay hai ki vah hamapar atyaachaar athava atikraman kar de.
20|46|us (allaah) ne kahaah tum bhay na karo, main tum donon ke saath hoon, sunata tatha dekhata hoon.

20|47|tum usake paas jao aur kaho ki ham tere paalanahaar ke rasool hain. atah, hamaare saath banee israeel ko jaane de aur unhen yaatana na de, ham tere paas tere paalanahaar kee nishaanee laaye hain aur shaanti usake lie hai, jo maargadarshan ka anusaran kare.
20|48|vaastav mein, hamaaree or vahyee (prakaashana) kee gaee hai ki yaatana usee ke lie hai, jo jhuthalaaye aur mukh phere.
20|49|usane kahaah he moosa! kaun hai tum donon ka paalanahaar
20|50|moosa ne kahaah hamaara paalanahaar vah hai, jisane pratyek vastu ko usaka vishesh roop pradaan kiya, phir maargadarshan[1] diya.
20|51|usane kahaah phir unakee dasha kya honee hai, jo poorv ke log hain
20|52|moosa ne kahaah usaka gyaan mere paalanahaar ke paas ek lekhy mein surakshit hai, mera paalanahaar na to chookata hai aur na[1] bhoolata hai.
20|53|jisane tumhaare lie dharatee ko bistar banaaya aur tumhaare chalane ke lie usamen maarg banaaye aur tumhaare lie aakaash se jal barasaaya, phir usake dvaara vibhinn prakaar kee upaj nikaalee.
20|54|tum svayan khao tatha apane pashuon ko charao, vastutah, isamen bahut-see nishaaniyaan hain budhdimaanon ke lie.
